content: 54 35 single_crochet 54 st 54 36 7sc decrease 48 37 single_crochet 48 st 48 38 6sc decrease 42 39 single_crochet 42 st 42 40 5sc decrease 36 41 single_crochet 36 st 36 after this row stuff the majority of the body 42 4sc decrease 30 43 single_crochet 30 st 30 44 3sc decrease 24 45 single_crochet 24 st 24 46 slip_stitch and f\o stuff the body don t forget to stuff into the sides to give it a nice round shape and then stuff the middle as much as you can don t close up the body we will sew on the head leave a yarn tail for sewing pictures arms make 2 lighter pink yarn we ll start with the fingers we re gonna make 2 with f\o and the third to which we re gonna add the first two fingers so make 2 1 magic_ring with 6 st 6 2 - 5 single_crochet 6 st for 4 row 6 3 slip_stitch and f\o cut the yarn leaving a bit of the yarn tail for sewing between the fingers when the arm is done now let s make the third finger 1 magic_ring with 6 st 6 2 - 5 single_crochet 6st for 4 row 6 6 6 single_crochet in this finger 3 single_crochet in the 2nd finger 6sc in the third finger 3sc in the 2nd finger so finish in the middle one 18 7 single_crochet 18 st 8 1sc decrease 12 9 single_crochet 12 st 12 lightly stuff the fingers only to give them a little shape 10 2sc decrease 9 11 - 27 single_crochet 9 st for 17 row stuff the arm as you go bit by bit leave 2 row unstuffed 28 add a few st if needed i added 2sc to get to the side and then close off by single_crochet through both sides i do 3sc and a slip_stitch as fourth cause it gives me that straight line at the top it s easier to sew on later leave a yarn tail for sewing pictures two fingers with f\o row 6 i add all the fingers this way i go into the stitch that is before the slip_stitch row 6 adding the third finger row 6 going back in the middle finger to do 3sc and that s the end of row 6 stuff the fingers lightly after you finished the arm and closed it up sew in between the fingers with your yarn tail form the 2 fingers to close them up legs start with black 1 magic_ring with 6 st 6 2 increase x6 12 3 - 7 single_crochet 12 st for 5 row 12 8 2sc decrease 9 9 - 10 single_crochet 9 st for 2 row 9 11 5 single_crochet 3 half_double_crochet 1sc 9 change color to light pink on the last st 12 4sc flo 5sc blo 9 13 - 29 single_crochet 9 st for 17 row after a few row stuff the foot and add a
